h1.a: Promesa Public SchoolsReady for college. Ready for life.

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.p: The mission of Promesa Public Schools is to inspire students to have college aspirations along with the academic skills and work ethic necessary to succeed.
Promesa Public Schools is a family of free, public, college-preparatory schools for Pre-k - 12th graders that is committed to supporting student and family through college graduation.

p.em: Promesa Public Schools es una familia de escuelas públicas, gratuitas, de preparación para la universidad, para estudiantes de Pre-k-12th grado que se comprometen a apoyar a estudiantes y familias hasta la graduación universitaria.

div.p:
Marcelo Tafoya
George Cantu
Cristella Garcia
Cynthia A. Davila
Superintendent
Dr. Salvador Cavazos
School board meetings are held on the second Tuesday of every month during the months school is in session unless otherwise noted. The location of the meeting will be announced when the board agenda is posted. Meetings are open to the public and all are welcome to attend.
Click on the Boardbook button to see when the next meeting is scheduled and to access current agendas.
Public Comment Guidelines can be found by visiting our Board of Directors page.
